Positive: This design has two holds depending on the direction the climbing hold is placed(one side is a rounded surface whilst the other is a lip) this widens the range of difficulty for my design.
Minus: Although this design consists of two surfaces, the rounded edge is a far too difficult surface to grip. As my design is aimed at new climbers the rounded surface would be too difficult and would not be used.
Improvement: Improve simplicity, ease of grip, and storage spacing to ensure all criterias are met.
